description: Fred Medlin has written a nice blog post on how helper classes can help you to keep your code DRY.
title: Android external storage helpers

description: Lars Vogel has revisited his tutorial on Homescreen Widgets. If you want to create one for yourself be sure that you don't miss it.
title: Android (Homescreen) Widgets - Tutorial

description: This post briefly explains how to do continuous build and deployment for iOS and Android with jenkins.
title: Continuous Build and Deployment for iOS and Android Apps

description: Do you need to integrate Instagram with your Application? Ketan Parmar has a nice blog post on how to do it.
title: Android Instagram Integration

description: David Chandler has released another introductionary post on project stORM, an ORM for Android. A little dealbreaker is that stORM does not support relations yet. If you want to use something more bullet proof checkout greenDAO. Nonetheless it's a pretty promising project.
title: stORM

description: Chris Banes has started a series on little useful snippets and he begins with DateUtils. Go and get those timesavers.
title: DateUtils

description: Nice little tutorial if you want to get started developing on GoogleTV.
title: Getting Started developing for Google TV

description: Mark Allison has posted his 5th episode on how to support multiple displays.
title: Multiple Displays – Part 5

description: Genymobile is a French expert company on Android OS and Application area. We are looking for Linux hacker, Android Fan and Metal music lover ! You want to work on INNOVATIVE projects like Home Automation, Connected Object, .... joint the team !
title: Bugdroid needs you Android/Linux Engineer !
Post a job on Android Weekly

description: Sometimes I have the feeling that the first task of every good studio is to release an open source ImageLoader component. This one seems pretty solid since it has acceptance tests. So if you have not choosen your favourite yet then check it out.
title: ImageLoader

description: Do you need a directory chooser for your app? Pascal Hartig has released a reference implementation ready to use for your project.
title: Android-DirectoryChooser

description: Benjamin Besse has released Android Validator an Form validation library as an library project.
title: Android-Validator

description: Good news everyone we're back from our winter vacation. And for an awesome new years gift google is allowing developers to reply comments in the Play Store.
title: Reply to Comments in Play Store

description: A little outrage went through the community when Harri Smått found out that if you disable notifications in Android 4.1 then Toasts are also disabled.
title: Toasts: Should Not Be Important, May Be Blocked

description: A tale in developer mud-wrestling. Come on! Be a good community - not an evil one.
title: My app is getting 1-star ratings from another dev
